mod.name: The M10 Robot
mod.credits:
Art Assets - 100% Orange Juice (sprites, cards)
BaseMod, ModTheSpire, and StSLib - Bug Kiooeht
Beta Testing - Spookalon
Korean Translation - Saki
Simplified Chinese Translation - Leaf_Fallen
mod.description: Adds M10 Robot from 100% Orange Juice.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Magnum Strike
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Apply 2 Lock-On

cards.name: Magnum Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Apply 2 Lock-On

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Surveillance
cards.description:
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight.
Gain 3 m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Surveillance+
cards.description:
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight.
Gain 3 m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Assault
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Assault+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Ascension
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
Draw 1 card.
m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand 1 time.

m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand 1 time.

cards.name: Ascension+
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
Draw 2 cards.
m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand 1 time.

cards.name: Assault Field
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle 3 Assault into your draw pile.

cards.name: Assault Field+
cards.description: Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies. Shuffle 3 Assault+ into your draw pile.

cards.name: Attack Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Attack Down+
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Apply 3 Weak to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Bramble
cards.description:
Gain 2 m10robot:Spikes.
Gain Block equal to your m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Bramble+
cards.description:
Gain 4 m10robot:Spikes.
Gain Block equal to your m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Brief Respite
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Brief Respite+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Defense Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Defense Down+
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Apply 3 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fortify

cards.name: Fortify+

cards.name: Heat Seekers+
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies with Lock-On.

cards.name: Juggling
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Juggling*
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Next turn, draw 2 additional cards.

cards.name: Juggling+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight.

cards.name: Lash+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Channel 1 m10robot:Searchlight.

cards.name: Merge
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
m10robot:Extract 1 card.

cards.name: Merge+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
m10robot:Extract 1 card.

cards.name: Pile Driver
cards.description:
m10robot:Spiky.
Deal 7 damage.
Deal 7 damage to a random other enemy.

cards.name: Pile Driver+
cards.description:
m10robot:Spiky.
Deal 10 damage.
Deal 10 damage to a random other enemy.

cards.name: Prelude
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Overclock the next card you play 2 times.

cards.name: Prelude+
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Overclock the next card you play 2 times.

cards.name: Returning Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Next turn, gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Returning Shield*
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Next turn, gain 8 Block and draw 1 additional card.

cards.name: Returning Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.

cards.name: Scrape Off
cards.description:
m10robot:Spiky.
Deal 4 damage.
Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Scrape Off+
cards.description:
m10robot:Spiky.
Deal 6 damage.
Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Scrapper
cards.description:
Evoke your next Orb.
Gain 3 m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Scrapper+
cards.description:
Evoke your next Orb.
Gain 2 m10robot:Spikes for each m10robot:Upgrade it had plus 3.

cards.name: Seeker
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On.
If the enemy already had Lock-On, deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Seeker*
cards.description:
Apply 2 Lock-On.
If the enemy already had Lock-On, deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Seeker+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On.
If the enemy already had Lock-On, deal 12 damage.

cards.name: Split Beam
cards.description: Deal 3 damage 2 times. When m10robot:Extracted, increase its hits by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Split Beam+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage 2 times. When m10robot:Extracted, increase its hits by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Steel Wall
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.

cards.name: Steel Wall+
cards.description:
Gain 16 Block.

cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.

cards.name: Step Up+
cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Extract 1 card.
m10robot:Overclock it 2 times.

cards.name: Thorn Field+

m10robot:Swappable.

m10robot:Inert.
m10robot:Overclock all cards in your hand X times.

cards.name: All In+

cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain 3 Block.

cards.name: Balance Currents+
cards.description: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Bitmask
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Channel 1 m10robot:Bit for each Attack played this turn.

cards.name: Bitmask+

Deal 10 damage.

m10robot:Swappable.

cards.name: Cloaking
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Cloaking*
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Your next Attack deals 5 additional damage.

cards.name: Cloaking+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Command
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage for each Channeled Orb.
If the enemy has Lock-On, m10robot:Upgrade all your Orbs 1 time.

cards.name: Command+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage for each Channeled Orb.

cards.name: Disable
cards.description:
Enemy loses 5 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Disable*
cards.description:

Apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Disable+
cards.description:
Enemy loses 5 Strength this turn.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Divided Attention
cards.description: Discard 1 card at random. m10robot:Extract 3 cards at random.

cards.name: Divided Attention*
cards.description: Discard 1 card. m10robot:Extract 3 cards at random.

cards.name: Divided Attention+
cards.description: Discard 1 card at random. m10robot:Extract 4 cards at random.

cards.name: EMP
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: EMP+
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.
Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Energy Shield
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
If you had no Block, gain [E] .

cards.name: Energy Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
If you had no Block, gain [E] .

cards.name: Engage
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 1 Lock-On.
If the enemy intends to attack, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Engage*
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 1 Lock-On.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Engage+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Apply 2 Lock-On.
If the enemy intends to attack, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Evasion Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Enemy takes 3 additional damage from all sources this turn.

cards.name: Evasion Down+
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Enemy takes 5 additional damage from all sources this turn.

cards.name: Extrapolate
cards.description: Whenever you m10robot:Extract a card, m10robot:Overclock it 1 time.

cards.name: Extrapolate+
cards.description: Whenever you m10robot:Extract a card, m10robot:Overclock it 1 time.

cards.name: Filter
cards.description:
m10robot:Extract 1 card.
Swap your draw and discard piles.

cards.name: Filter+
cards.description:
m10robot:Extract 2 cards.
Swap your draw and discard piles.

cards.name: Health Down
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Enemy loses 7 HP.
If you have played Evasion Down this turn, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Health Down+
cards.description:
m10robot:Swappable.
Enemy loses 10 HP.
If you have played Evasion Down this turn, repeat this effect.

cards.name: Heuristics
cards.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, apply 1 Lock-On to a random enemy.

cards.name: Heuristics*
cards.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, apply 1 Lock-On to a random enemy.

cards.name: Heuristics+
cards.description: Whenever you Channel an Orb, apply 2 Lock-On to a random enemy.

cards.description:

cards.name: Light Show+

cards.name: Quick Boot+

Gain 6 Block.

gain 6 Block.

gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Quick Thinking

Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Quick Thinking+

Attacks drawn this way cost 0 this turn.

cards.name: RAM Upgrade
cards.description:
Gain 1 Orb slot.
Whenever you Channel an Orb, m10robot:Upgrade it 1 time.

cards.name: RAM Upgrade*
cards.description:
Gain 1 Orb slot.
Whenever you Channel an Orb, m10robot:Upgrade it 2 times.

cards.name: RAM Upgrade+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Orb slots.
Whenever you Channel an Orb, m10robot:Upgrade it 1 time.

cards.name: Rewind
cards.description: The first time you lose Block each turn, gain that much Block next turn.

cards.name: Rewind+
cards.description: The first time you lose Block each turn, gain that much Block next turn.

cards.name: Robo Beam
cards.description:

cards.name: Robo Beam+

cards.name: Spike Shell+

cards.name: Turbo
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Turbo*
cards.description: Next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Turbo+

Channel 1 m10robot:Bomb.

cards.name: Wide Angle+

cards.name: Recovery Mode+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 7 Block if you have any unspent energy.

cards.name: Reflective Shell

cards.name: Reflective Shell+
cards.description: Fully blocked attacks are reflected onto the attacker 1 time.

Draw 2 cards.

cards.description:
Gain X Strength.
ALL enemies lose
X Strength.

ALL enemies lose

cards.description:
m10robot:Inert.

m10robot:Inert.
Lose 5 HP.

cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Solid Witch+
cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Spiky Plating

Whenever you play a card, gain 1 m10robot:Spikes.

cards.name: Spiky Plating+
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card, gain 1 m10robot:Spikes.

relics.name: Dual Core
relics.description: m10robot:Overclock the first card you play each combat 2 times.

relics.name: Third Eye
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Lock-On to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Froggy
relics.description: Whenever you m10robot:Extract, Extract 1 additional card.
relics.flavorText: It has a very sticky tongue.

relics.name: Searchlight Mk2
relics.description: Whenever you Channel a m10robot:Searchlight, m10robot:Upgrade it 1 time.

relics.name: UFO
relics.description: Whenever you play a Power card, ALL enemies lose 2 Strength for the turn.
relics.flavorText: It got lost on it's way to the jungle dance party.

relics.name: Robo Ball
relics.description: The first time you are attacked each combat, take no damage. The attacker takes the full damage instead.

relics.name: Awakened Core
relics.description: Replaces Dual Core. m10robot:Overclock the first card you play each turn 1 time.

potions.name: Overclock Potion
potions.description: Overclock all cards in your hand 2 times.

potions.name: Locking Potion
potions.description: ALL enemies lose 5 Strength this turn.

potions.name: Nullifier
potions.description: Draw 1 card. All cards in your hand cost 0 until played.

keywords.name: Bit
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to the enemy with the least HP when you play an Attack. When Evoked, deals damage and applies Lock-On to a random enemy.

keywords.name: Bomb
keywords.description: Orb: Stores damage when you are attacked. When Evoked, deals damage to the enemy with the most HP.

keywords.name: Extract
keywords.description: Move the most recent cards in your discard pile to your hand.

keywords.name: Searchlight
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage when you are attacked. When Evoked, grants Spikes.

keywords.name: Overclock
keywords.description: Increases the base stats of cards by 25% until played.

keywords.name: Recoil
keywords.description: Your next attack deals 50% less damage.

keywords.name: Spikes
keywords.description:
When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back.
At the start of your turn, lose Spikes if you were attacked.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: A stunned enemy does nothing this turn.

keywords.name: Swappable
keywords.description: Right Click to swap the effect of this card.

keywords.name: Upgrade
keywords.description: Upgrading Orbs makes them more powerful. Orbs can be upgraded any number of times.
